title: 5 Amazon KDP Keywords HOT Niches Low Competition Keyword #KDP #KDPKeywords

tactics.name: low_competition_keyword_research
tactics.description: Identify niches with high keyword scores and low competition using tools like Creative Fabrica for design.
steps: Analyze BSR and average price analytics
Use Creative Fabrica for interior design templates
caveats: Requires minimal design skills for interiors
source_quotes: this has a great keyword Niche score of 59

tactics.name: category_selection_based_on_ranking
tactics.description: Choose categories by analyzing existing books' rankings and selecting high-performing niches.
steps: Analyze top-ranking books in target niches
Match your book's content to those categories
caveats: Avoid niches with negative reviews about style or execution
source_quotes: you want to keep that in mind when you are choosing the categories for your book

tactics.name: look_inside_optimization
tactics.description: Enhance conversion by showcasing the book's interior through the 'Look Inside' feature.
steps: Design interiors with clear tables of contents
Add visuals and formatting to preview pages
caveats: Ensure previews align with customer expectations to avoid negative feedback
source_quotes: have a look at the books interior before purchasing

tactics.name: keyword_validation
tactics.description: Verify keywords using look inside features and book interiors to avoid mismatches
steps: Check book interior for keyword alignment
Validate BSR rankings against keyword scores
caveats: Avoid relying solely on keyword scores without content verification
source_quotes: this could have been easily prevented using the look inside feature

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Selection
tactics.description: Prioritize keywords with niche scores above 40 and analyze bestsellers for content gaps.
steps: Check BSR rankings of top-selling books
Review comment sections for improvement ideas
Use Creative Fabrica for interior templates
caveats: Avoid niches with saturation beyond 50000 BSR
source_quotes: this book belongs to a section for notes...left that Space Blank for describing...

heuristics.name: boost_low_review_niches
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200 and BSR under 50,000, prioritize the niche
source_quotes: the majority of the books are independently published

heuristics.name: low_review_threshold
heuristics.condition: If a niche has fewer than 200 reviews, it may indicate low competition
source_quotes: this book is currently ranking in finance and small business bookkeeping

heuristics.name: low_competition_boost
heuristics.condition: If keyword score is above 40, prioritize niches with low review counts

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Optimization
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize keywords with comment-section improvement suggestions
